DOC.brief_summary: A prospective open-label , single treatment study assess safety performance Nyxoah SAT system treatment Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.brief_title: Safety Performance Study Nyxoah SAT System Treating OSA
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed moderate severe Obstructive Sleep Apnea Have fail tolerate CPAP treatment Willing capable providing informed consent Willing capable return followup visit sleep study , include evaluation procedure fill questionnaire BMI limit Subjects complete concentric collapse soft palate level per endoscopy
